sqlMap.statement:
SELECT OPT.CONV_PROC_TP_TXT FROM DS_ORD_LINE_PROC_DFN DOLPD ,ORD_PROC_TP OPT WHERE DOLPD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND DOLPD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DOLPD.DS_ORD_TP_CD = #dsOrdTpCd# AND DOLPD.DS_ORD_LINE_CATG_CD = #dsOrdLineCatgCd# AND DOLPD.EFF_FROM_DT <= #slsDt# AND NVL(DOLPD.EFF_THRU_DT, '99991231') >= #slsDt# AND DOLPD.ACTV_FLG = #actvFlg# AND DOLPD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = OPT.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DOLPD.ORD_PROC_TP_CD = OPT.ORD_PROC_TP_CD AND DOLPD.EZCANCELFLAG = OPT.EZCANCELFLAG
AND OPT.EFF_FROM_DT <= #slsDt# AND NVL(OPT.EFF_THRU_DT, '99991231') >= #slsDt#
AND OPT.ACTV_FLG = #actvFlg# AND ROWNUM = 1
